hero_background: A futuristic, isometric 3D web builder interface floating in a void, neon purple and blue lighting, high tech, glass morphism style, 4k resolution.
feature_ai: Abstract representation of artificial intelligence constructing a website wireframe, glowing nodes, digital particles, sleek modern style.
feature_code: Clean holographic code snippets floating in 3D space, matrix style but with a bright, clean color palette (white, blue, violet).
avatar_default: A friendly 3D generated avatar of a tech professional, minimal style, soft lighting.
